Kera
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Recommandé
4.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 18 aout 2020
Metamorphosis Review

Metamorphosis Nails Both Its Kafka Inspiration and Its Sense of Scale Perfectly. Very Enjoyable Platforming Adventure.

Intro
Hello everybody, I’ve returned with a brand-new review! In this one I’m covering an indie platfoming adventure game based on a famous book by Franz Kafka called Metamorphosis by Ovid Works and All In! Games.

To be completely honest, I’ve yet to actually read the original book by Franz Kafka but I’ve heard of it quite a few times over the years. I also know very little about Franz Kafka himself other than that he wrote some pretty wild stories, Metamorphosis being one of them. After playing this game, I’ve definitely become pretty fascinated by the book and I definitely plan to give it a read in the near future. The game’s story definitely feels like it was created while high on acid or on an LSD Trip, it’s quite weird which is the very definition of many of Kafka’s stories from what I’ve heard. It definitely captures that sense of weirdness quite well.

I also found it rather amusing that the developers are called Ovid Works because the ancient writer/philosopher Ovid also wrote a book called Metamorphosis. Fitting name on two accounts.

As for the game, it’s wild but it’s an intriguing kind of wild. I’ve always been drawn to surrealist and overly weird games and stories, so I was immediately drawn into the experience. I wound up playing it in just about one go as well. It was all very immersive and I believe it largely had to do with its amazing sense of scale. You really feel like you’re nothing but a mere bug in the world because everything is so enormous compared to where the camera sits. I’ll also admit there were definitely times when it gave me pretty hardcore vertigo, especially when jumping from high up, whew, was pretty nuts for sure.

I think that about covers our introductions for this review so let’s shrink ourselves down and head to the tower to get this review started!

Story and Setting
The story to Metamorphosis revolves around a man named Gregor Samsa who is suddenly turned into a bug by something known as The Tower. He must traverse his friend Josef’s house as a bug in order to reach The Tower itself and hopefully transform himself back into a human again.

The journey takes you across some pretty crazy landscapes, each filled with friendly bugs who will often aid you in your quest. Some even have their own stories for you to discover as well. Some areas include Josef’s bedroom, a bar inside a gramophone, and a bug city created around an old and decaying projector. The journey is a decent length and you meet a wide variety of unique characters along the way.

One thing I found really cool about this game was the fact that it has its own language for the bugs that’s vaguely English but wholly bug sounding. If you listen carefully enough you can make out some words being said as well. I thought this was a very cool touch and definitely made the bugs more unique in the process.

The story was a pretty fascinating one to say the least, especially in the end when the big surprise is revealed. Made me kinda glad that I haven’t read the book yet because it would have likely spoiled the ending to this game. That said I probably spoiled the ending to the book now so, double-edged sword.

Gameplay
Much of your time in Metamorphosis will be spent making your way through various levels as you attempt to reach the tower. The majority of the gameplay revolves around platforming your way across objects that are much larger than you in size. There are some objects that you’ll be able to grab onto by default but to climb up walls, you’ll need to make yourself sticky with glue or ink blots that are spread throughout some areas. The stickiness will run out with use though so you’ll have to watch the meter to make sure you’ll be able to make it to your destination.

Outside that, the game is your average platforming experience, except on a much smaller scale.

Graphics and Sound
The graphics in this game are quite impressive all around. I mentioned before that I liked the sense of scale in this game and I 100% meant it. It’s quite impressive that the developers managed to get the scale of objects so perfect that it really felt like you were a tiny, insignificant bug wandering around a world much larger than itself. Mad props for managing that because it made the game so much more fascinating.

The voice acting for the game was equally impressive. The unique language that was created for the bugs was a very cool touch and I don’t think the game would have had the same effect if the bugs simply spoke straight English like the human characters. It also greatly added to the overall weirdness of the game too because combined with the scale of the objects, the language your character speaks definitely helped in creating a very immersive experience.

The sound effects and music also fit the game very well. The music blended into the background seamlessly and it improved the sense of mystery and wonder at many of the things you were witnessing. There’s some very fantastical things going on in the bug world and the music definitely helped in shaping your first moments seeing each wonder.

Pros
Excellent, And Very Weird, Story
Excellent Sense of Scale
Unique Language Created For The Bugs Enhanced The Immersion Of The Game
Beautiful Graphics
Very Strange and Unique World To Explore
Excellent Music and Sound Effects
Great Voice Acting
♥♥♥♥
The Ending Felt A Little Rushed
Final Verdict
Overall, Metamorphosis has easily become one of my favorite adventure games that I’ve experienced this year. It’s a highly enjoyable and very immersive experience and its superb sense of being tiny is just phenomenal. I loved everything about my experience with this game and I can’t recommend it enough. My only complaint is that the ending felt a little rushed but compared to the rest of the game this is a really minor issue, at least for me it is. The journey is great and that’s what matters the most.

In the end I’ve decided to give the game 4.5/5 Stars, a nearly perfect experience that I highly recommend giving a shot if you get the chance. https://endworldgaming.wordpress.com/2020/08/13/metamorphosis-review/
 
Daily Game Bytes

Non recommandé
3.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 17 aout 2020
The game is fun and has great graphics, but it has a few downfalls.

Most of the game is just a series of walking from point to point or fetch quests. It's also rather short, I've completed the game in three hours and while I could go back and finish achievements, there is no real point.

The story line is subpar, as it's a few narrations over and over. If you manage to take some time in a zone, the dialogue will continue to repeat itself and you'll be forced to listen to it again and again.

Finally the end is rather disappointing and leaves me unwilling to try the game again.

All and all, it ended up feeling like an unfinished game that is only really worth 5 dollars. At the price point, I do not recommend it to people as you can find better value out of almost any other game on steam.

Recommandé
7.3 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 11 décembre 2020
面白かった～！

雰囲気がとても良く、暗い感じかと思ったら童話的なファンタジー感のある、居心地のいい空間でした。

ゲーム自体はアスレチック移動してNPCに話を聞いてどんどんルートを進んでいく格闘要素のないアクション・アドベンチャーで、アイテム、スキルツリーなどは存在しません。
主観視点な上にプレイヤーが地面を這いつくばっているせいで視界が限られているのですが、レベルデザインが非常に優秀でどのルートを通ればいいのか、目線が常に通っています。
またミスって足を踏み外しても、もとのルートに戻るための道が用意されているので安心してプレイできます。

不思議な国のアリスや、千と千尋の神隠しを自分でプレイしているようなゲームです。
あまり勘のいいプレイヤーではないので２回ほど詰まりましたが、トータル６時間弱、異世界を堪能しました。
素晴らしいゲームですがエンディングは期待しないでください。ゴールするとシュッと終わります…。
エンディングにエピソードつけてくれたら神ゲーなんだけどな～。

3.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 5 avril 2021
This is so beautiful and so short... I cried in the end.
Yes, it's much better to do your homework and read Kafka. And not just "Die Verwandlung", because there's much more connections. For example, it's good to hear the stories of a people in the background. Unfortunately, they are not localised. So if you are not ok with English, you can miss a part of experience (not much of a story, anyway). Also, it's funny to recognize the other names on the books and papers. The game is a gem, if you know what's it about. Perfect adaptation, masterpiece.
And yes, when you move as a bug, you soon start to feel like a bug. Controls, camera and speed are tuned incredibly well.
I'd easily paid full price for it. In my location, of course.

Évaluation publiée le 10 janvier 2021
Небольшое прохождение я видела у Куплинова и сразу после, решила приобрести, чтобы пройти самой.
Плюсы:
+ Графика
+ Музыкальное сопровождение (Очень понравилось!)
+ Озвучка (Некоторые реплики персонажей забавляли)
+ Геймплей (Более нейтрально. Ничего заурядного бегаешь и прыгаешь :D)
+ Оптимизация (Лично у меня не было никаких проблем)
+ Необычный сюжет (Несколько концовок)

Минусы:
- Возможно продолжительность (Я бы вряд ли сказала, что такой игре нужно много часов)
- Наверное, отнесу сюда то, что не всем с первого раза понятна суть сюжета, особенно если не читал произведения автора
- Однообразность действий (Но мне не показалось это минусом, так как я понимала, что это и ждёт)

В общем, рекомендую.

Recommandé
3.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 16 juillet 2021
Produit reçu gratuitement

I got this game as a gift from one of my friends, who noticed it at the top of my wishlist. I'm into Entomology, and I enjoyed the idea of a puzzle game where the main character had been turned into an insect.

I love every bit of the game, with the voice acting, personalities, and environments.

I ended up feeling off, though. The ending portions of the game feel.. rushed, somehow. There were concepts that never went anywhere, (shadowy figures in part of a level), and an overall unpolished feeling surrounding the rest of the game makes me feel like it was rushed.

The endings felt abrupt; though maybe I was missing something. Being able to destroy the main bad guy with the push of a button just didn't feel right.

I love this game to bits, and enjoyed it, and I feel like it was going to be so much more, but was stopped, somehow.

also the music is good

713 produits enregistrés

1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile

Recommandé
14.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 15 aout 2020
Produit reçu gratuitement

So, I played through the entire the game five or six times and what can I say as the achievement / collectibles hunter.
First, thanks for providing me a early review copy of the game!

  • Achievements:
    26.

  • Collectibles:
    Yes, Effigies (20).

  • Glitched achievements:
    0, all work great.

  • Achievements difficulty:
    2/10

  • Approximate time to earn all:
    3-5 hours are enough.

  • Story related / Missable achievements:
    10*/16

  • Difficulty related?:
    No, there is no difficulty levels.

  • Minimum Playthroughs:
    1.5 (Chapter select option)

=== Achievements ===
There are total 26 achievements, 25 separate and 1 is the "platinum".

=== Collectibles ===
The only "collectibles" in the game are strange colored objects we need to destory - effigies. There are 20 of them, destroying all unlock

=== Glitched achievements ===
Every achievement works well, tried to earn all of them multiple times and no glitches appeared. Thats great.

=== Achievement difficulty ===
Since there are no boss fights or difficulty related trophies all of them arent require multiple attempts. The only thing I want to notice - sometimes achievement descriptions or titles may confuse (for example Survival of the strongest - there is no tigers in the game lol). Puzzles in the game also dont annoying or unlogical, you dont need to combine different stuff or find hidden things, not, all is one the surface.

=== Approximate time to earn all ===
This depends on how long took to you to complete the first run. After you beat the entire game there's chapter select option unlocks so you can choose chapter which you need. Actually, all 26 achievements can be earned under 2 hours, so 3-5 is more then enough.

=== Story related / Missable achievements ===
Okay, there're 10 achievements you will earn during the story and 2-4 more depending on your choices. Others are missbale and required some actions you need to perform. There's a missable achievements guide in guides section, you may check it.

=== Minimum Playthroughs ===
The game has two different endings and two ways to solve main story puzzle in Bugville town. But as I said there's chapter select option unlocks after you complete the game for first time so you can run both chapters where the choices are.

Summary - a good game, easy to hunt for achievements and all works well. I recommend this.

Non recommandé

Évaluation publiée le 24 février 2021

Materiał wideo (a w nim 🎁 konkurs i kopia Metamorphosis do wygrania):
Vidéo YouTube™: Metamorphosis (PL) Konkurs na polską grę o robakach (Gameplay PL) 
Vues : 4,986
🎮 Oglądaj mnie na żywo: https://twitch.tv/kaftann 💙 Zostań Patronem i graj ze mną: https://patronite.pl/kaftann 🛒 Kupuj gry TANIO na https://www.♥♥♥.com/r/kaftann 📌 Moje social media:...

Za co chwalić?
- Ciekawy pomysł na rozgrywkę, inspirowaną twórczością Franza Kafki;
- Polska wersja językowa;
- Osobliwy klimacik, choć...

Z czym się żalić?
- ...momentami zaskakująco nieprzekonujący i mało ciekawy;
- Archaiczne animacje i brzydka grafika;
- Rozgrywka jest powtarzalna i z czasem może zrobić się wtórna.
 
Kaftann
2,865 produits enregistrés
1
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
6.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 28 avril 2021
Игра специфична, это то что стоит сразу обозначить.

Специфична не столько по геймплею, он тут достаточно тривиален, сколько в общем и целом. На первый взгляд ничего прям дико не обычного нет, но большое количество маленьких деталей, эффектов, манеры подачи и т.п., которые в этой игре сделаны, если и не очень профессионально, то уж точно с душой, формируют общеположительное впечатление. И что главное выделяют ее на фоне других проектов.

Так или иначе, игра проходится на одном дыхании, так как не продолжительна сама по себе, и умудряется быть увлекательной, хотя опять же не для каждого игрока. Типа, это тот самый проект с которым стоит ознакомится хотя бы ради того что бы разнообразить свой игровой опыт, а уже в процессе будет видно: твое это (а я думаю, что если вас заинтересовал данный проект , то скорее всего - да) или все же рефаунд. Тут присутствует еще такой момент: игра очень занимательна в плане звукового сопровождения, будь то музыка, речь, или фоновые шумы, и зачастую не смотря на скромность графики, своими визуальными решениями ей удается удивить и погрузить в процесс прохождения. Сцена с превращением, так вообще на кончиках пальцев. Не потому что это шедевр, а по тому что именно этот момент, а точнее то как он обыгран, заставил меня по другому глянуть на игру, к которой изначально я был слегка предвзят, и вместе с гг погрузится в новый для нас мир. Точнее в мир привычный, но под другим углом (немножко с низу). А моменте с изменением голоса гг и его догадкой о перевоплощении, так вообще - чистый секс, спасибо актеру и звуковику.

Некоторые, и на мой взгляд одни из самых важных, диалогов не будут подаваться в лоб, а лишь звучать на фоне, что будет вызывать дискомфорт, если английски - не ваша тема, так как читать субтитры в процессе самого геймплея - это боль. А почитать их стоит, так как, на мой скромный вкус, это маленькие шедевры, с кучей своеобразного юмора и колкости в сторону гос структур, да и сюжет хоть как то разобрать помогут. В целом игра очень атмосферная, и со своим колоритом. А рассматривать отдельные детальки быта, такие как пачки сигарет, банки кофе, спички, бердекли и т.д. вообще одно удовольствие (хотя может это я такой е*ан*тый), жаль что их разнообразие уж очень умеренное.

В плане сюжета, сразу ясно откуда черпалось вдохновение. Так же просто и глубоко, а главное ни хера не понятно.

P.S.
И еще один момент. так как мы играем от лица жука, то и вид от первого лица будет крайне специфичен, на столько низким и прибитым к полу я его еще не видел ни в одной игре. И такое положение угла обзора вызывает некий дискомфорт при игре. Такой чисто психологический дискомфорт, хотя со временем он сходит на нет. Не могу с уверенностью сказать была ли это вынужденная мера, или некая недоработка. А скорее всего так и было задумано...
 
Tony Peperony
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0

적당히 재미는 있는데 엔딩이 좀 허무하네

4.6 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 21 aout 2020
Сначала у меня были большие сомнения по поводу Metamorphosis, подумал что за ерунда... затем увидел, что есть демо и не задумываясь попробовал игру и знаете что, она зашла! После ждал релиз и он наступил. Игра рассказывает о двух друзьях которые конкретно встряли, но каждый по-разному, кому-то достались мерзкие копы, арест и суд, кому-то обличье жука, лапки и работа на Башню.
В целом игра довольно короткая, но успевает понравиться, зацепить и не надоесть. Возможно будет и вторая часть, кто знает, все предпосылки для этого есть.
Могу точно сказать, что в Metamorphosis стоит поиграть! Ценник не высокий, сюжет не длинный, проходится на одном дыхании! Рекомендую
Мой плейлист:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLHEwVYzdW_brzvrnG8wkaPGnDGCV-Ikq9

Évaluation publiée le 12 aout 2020
I've only started playing this game, so I cannot attest to it's overall story. But from what I've experienced so far, and the fun I've been having playing it, I cannot help but recommend it.

If you want to watch me playing through it before getting it yourself, I've left a link below.
Vidéo YouTube™: Metamorphosis - Episode 1 - Strange Occurrings 
Vues : 46
Having mysteriously turned into a bug, can we figure out what has happened to us, will we ever become human again? What is in store for us in this strange world?


The Review:

The gameplay is very intuitive, you'll find it quite hard to lose control of yourself when navigating the world. This is something that a lot of games fail to do right when it comes to a more 3D form of travel. You can navigate most surfaces with ease, your jump height is perfect, character speed can be controlled easily and doesn't leave you feeling nauseous. Only ceilings and sheer walls you cannot climb, but there is enough of what I presume is honey to help you with the later.

The graphics have a charm to them, and fall nicely between realism and surrealism depending on the circumstances. Their only failing comes to the human figures themselves, which don't hold as much of that charm. However I can forgive that completely as they're not really the main subjects of this game.

The bugs around you are full of character and really bring life to the world. This is helped by their own dialogue which isn't intelligible and helps to differentiate them from the voice acted humans of the world.

I can't recommend this game enough, and I can't wait to finish it and see where it goes.

Recommandé
2.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 12 novembre 2020
DISCLAIMER: This is a full review, and NOT a first impressions review

PLEASE NOTE: I recommended this game with some exceptions, overall if the game did not live up to just a tiny expectation, I would not have recommended it at all, so please read the review carefully if you are thinking of buying/playing this game

Metamorphosis is a game developed by Ovid Works and published by All in! Games and is a digital adaptation of Franz Kafka's book of the same name

Is this a good adaptation? Having read the book and now having finished this... it's not perfect but respects the source material

The game offers some nice graphics, although some ugly glitches here and there, it is pleasant all the same. The lip-syncing is awful and the voice acting performances (apart from the bugs) is abysmal to semi-bad

Metamorphosis overall, however, is an okay game to play which ends really quickly, and it does get boring if being played for a long time, but is an okay-ish to meh adventure "walking simulator" game and to play in short bursts

RECOMMENDED :)

REVIEW SOURCES:
  • None

Le doy pulgar arriba, aunque si le pudiera dar calificación tendría un 7.8 quizás.
Pero en serio no sé por qué Steam no pone la libertad de calificar más específicamente. Tan siquiera ♥♥♥ estrellitas!

En fin.
El juego cumple pero no es la gran cosa. Quizás soy yo que tengo broncas ♥♥♥ los juegos narrativos. O más bien aventuras jugables.

Te lo pasas en unas cuantas horas y ya. Nada más. Bueno sí, algo más, hay unas cosas extrañas escondidas de vez en cuando que hay que buscar bien pero que el juego NO te las va a contar ni te va a decir en qué áreas te falta conseguir. Por lo que esto simplemente se queda como un logro (logros que yo normalmente me los paso por el arco del triunfo ya que usualmente te piden cosas tontas, irrelevantes o muy difíciles. Se vuelve un capricho a seguir más que un reto dentro del juego como conseguir todos los coleccionables).
Música buena pero siempre te imaginas que ese tipo de música va a ser buena.
Poderes no consigues nada más que de vez en cuando puedes encontrar algo pegadizo y ya puedes andar como un bicho rastrero de forma vertical.
Estoy recordando que hay otro juego bonito, lineal y narrativamente más largo que se llama Unknown Fate. Ese es mucho mejor que este y también ♥♥♥ elementos surrealistas. ♥♥♥ más reto que este seguro.

Calificación 7.8

Recommandé
3.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 19 aout 2020
Produit reçu gratuitement

Full review (including score):
Vidéo YouTube™: Metamorphosis (ACTUAL Game Review) [PC] 
Vues : 1,351
A game based on Franz Kafka's The Metamorphosis? Can't say I've seen that one before! Let's see if it's any good in my Metamorphosis review!

Summarized review below!
The rundown:
Pros:
+ Really cool level design
+ Fun platforming
+ Cryptic, yet interesting storyline
♥♥♥♥:
- Shallow puzzle design
- Disappointing ending

So I have a bit of a funny history behind why I decided to play this game. Back in 2014, I made a video on a game called Masters of the World – Geopolitical Simulator 3. One of the loading screen quotes for that game was a quote from Franz Kafka, whom I did not know at the time. Well, as you can expect, the comments made it very clear that I was stupid for not knowing who the man was.

So here we are nearly six and a half years later with a video game based on Kafka's most popular work: The Metamorphosis. Having since learned who the man was and having read that most popular work, I thought it'd be cool to give this game adaptation a look, even if it may be a loose adaptation.

Pros:
  • Really cool level design. Perhaps the most impressive thing about Metamorphosis is how it really sells the idea that you are an insect. Of course, this is largely due to the level design. The game has these massive environments full of all sorts of details, including the pencils laying around that form paths between platforms, the garbage that has been repurposed into little buildings, and the dangers brought on by objects we humans take for granted, like fans.

    All of this really drives home the point that you are a small and vulnerable insect, nothing more, nothing less. It's exactly the same feeling I had while playing Grounded a few weeks ago. However, the devs couple this with a sort of surreal and gloomy visual direction, which makes for a very interesting combo. On one hand, you're a bug exploring this human-inhabited world, but on the other, there's something darker to it, something hidden away behind it all. It's definitely comparable to Kafka's original work in that regard, so I got to give the devs some credit there.

  • Fun platforming. For what is effectively a walking sim, I was surprised with how much fun I had with the game's platforming. It's nothing too complex, but you've got your jump and your sticky feet ability that allow for a lot more exploration than what is usually the case with such walking sims. It removes a lot of the linearity to the game, allowing you to explore the environment and come up with your own routes as you play.

    I had a lot of fun ignoring the "expected" route and just parkouring my own way up to wherever I needed to go, sometimes even breaking the game's platforming in a way by standing on ledges that are mere pixels in size. Granted, a lot of this is again due to the excellent level design, but it was such a standout feature to me that I felt it deserved its own spot.

  • Cryptic, yet interesting storyline. So as I said earlier, this game is just a partial adaptation of Kafka's The Metamorphosis. It uses its main themes, but kinda goes off and does its own thing, borrowing from more Kafka stories in the process. I don't want to get into spoiler territory, but I will say that the game does a good job setting up this sort of dual narrative of sorts. You're figuring out the story related to the protagonist, while also developing this other story along the side, with the two becoming further linked as the game goes on.

    It does a pretty good job at this, even if the actual storytelling may be cryptic. You'll get the occasional full-on dialogue cutscene, but most of the story is told through the environment and little snippets given by the different NPCs. It's like a puzzle of sorts and from the get-go it's obvious that there's more to it than what is just shown on the surface. It may falter a bit (which I'll discuss shortly), but I enjoyed it for the most part.

♥♥♥♥:
  • Shallow puzzle design. The store page for the game describes it as having "challenging environmental puzzles", which is definitely a bit of a stretch. Not only are the puzzles not challenging, but it's kinda hard to even describe most of them as puzzles. You'll oftentimes be given a task that asks you to go to a certain location and interact with some object or other NPC and that's the extent of the so-called puzzle. Don't let the store page fool you, this is a walking sim with a decent amount of platforming and some very light puzzle mechanics, nothing complex enough to warrant the title of "puzzle game". And this is coming from a fan of walking sims, I just wanted to make sure nobody goes in with the wrong expectations here.

  • Disappointing ending. I may have found the story interesting, but I definitely did not like how it ended up. The game had this interesting double narrative thing going for it before it just kinda, ended. I don't know if it was lack of funds preventing the full story from being realized, but it just wraps itself up so quickly that it's hardly satisfying. And I say this for both endings, as the game has two of them. I mean, the game only took me two hours to clear, so maybe it's just a side effect of being on the shorter side, but I feel like they could have done a better job leading up to the end and wrapping it all up.

Overall:
Metamorphosis may be a short game, but it's still one I would recommend. From the wonderfully done level design to the fun platforming and cryptic storyline, there's some good stuff here. Granted, that story kinda crashes and burns by the end and the puzzle design isn't all that great, but I still had a good time with it. It might not be an immediate purchase, but worth a look if you can catch it on sale or in a bundle.

Follow my Steam Curator Page for more reviews + videos!

Recommandé
4.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 12 aout 2020
Кто из вас задумывался о том, каково живётся различным насекомым среди нас, людей? Каждый день сотни миллионы микробов под ободком унитаза спасаются от Великого Мочепотопа и Грандиозного Гoвнястого дождя. Бедные муравьи страдают от непоседливых детей, тыкающих палкой в их муравейники и оставляющих семьи без потомства. Комары, которые всего лишь пытаются выжить в очень короткий отведённый им жизненный срок, напиваются нашей кровью лишь затем, чтобы быть раздавленными великой дланью человеческой.

Грегору, главному герою игры Metamorphosis, предстоит на собственной шкуре ощутить весь ужас жизни простого жука, которому предстоит преодолеть длинный путь, полный преград и ловушек, чтобы попасть в некую Башню, получить работу, стать заслуженным работником дня/недели/месяца/года и получить иллюзорный шанс на возвращение в собственное бренное тело.

Стоит ли оно того? Каждый для себя решит сам.

А я, пожалуй, поползу дальше. Башня ждёт.
 
Un développeur ou une développeuse a répondu à cette évaluation

Non recommandé
4.0 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 11 juillet 2021
Metamorphosis es un juego de aventuras del 12 de agosto de 2020. ♥♥♥ un buen diseño gráfico y atención al detalle, pero ♥♥♥ un bajo control del bicho...
Somos Gregor, un hombre convertido en un pequeño insecto. El objetivo es resolver el misterio de la transformación, recuperar la forma humana y salvar al amigo de Gregor, Joseph, que fue arrestado por razones desconocidas. En el proceso, iremos resolviendo acertijos lógicos y de plataformas, mientras descubrimos un mundo surrealista, facilitado por la forma de insecto, que permite mecánicas tales como escalar superficies verticales. Moriremos muchas veces (es el único bicho que muere por una caída), pero los tiempos de carga y la cercanía ♥♥♥ el lugar del hecho son cortos.

Évaluation publiée le 14 aout 2020
The game is fun so far and looks good, but y'all need to stop claiming Kafka and make something for yourself. You took the name of the characters and the setting, not the theme. Kafka's stories aren't about conspiracies, they're deeply personal in nature. By making one of the first achievements "you're not alone" you're going directly against the grain of his metamorphosis story and most of his work as a cheap "we're so intellectual" marketing scheme. Shame.

Évaluation publiée le 27 avril 2023
Idk man, Im not really sure what should I take from playing this game. The sense of being small bug is great but thats about it. The whole art direction is cheesy and cringe. If its something, its an atmospheric puzzle game, but not really, because before you can solve anything, the game just tells you the solution. And why is it bloated with so many dull dialogs about nothing?! There are few little things for admirers of Kafka and it is a nice touch. But for such a short game it is hard to understand how it could be so boring.
 
Ponny
187 produits enregistrés
0
5 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Non recommandé
1.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 14 aout 2020
Игра не ультра плохая, особенно если вам не становится плохо от симуляторов хотьбы (мне же понравились тут антропоморфные насекомые и их исполнение), но проблемы имеются.
За основу сюжета игры взяли два произведения Кафки, и я понимаю, что игра даже не по мотивам, а по "вдохновению от творчества Кафки", но всё таки тут ощущаются в сюжете два произведения "Превращение" и "Процесс". И что забавно, тут больше цитируют слово в слово "Процесс", чем "Превращение" (хотя игра называется "Превращение", хее). НО
Проблема игры не в том, что тут не делают 1в1 как написано в книге (Bad Mojo, например, вообще сделал отсебятину, а игра вышла потрясающей), люди могут вдохновлятся чем-то и делают свои истории. Проблема в том, что в игре есть прям длиннющие цитаты из произведения "Процесса", которые звучат на заднем фоне постоянно. И по подаче и форме видно, что создатели какфку не очень то и поняли, осознав в "Превращении" только превращание героя, а в "Процессе" - процесс диалогов.
Проблема есть и в отображении и анимации людей, и мне не понятно, почему нельзя было просто сделать игру, что ты стал жуком, беседуешь с жуками и изредка видишь человеческую руку/ногу. Проблема есть с актерами озвучки (может это вкусовщина, но пока ты играешь в симулятор ходьбы, то немного уныло слушать подобные голоса было).
И главная проблема в том, что это симулятор ходьбы с механиками, которые могли бы быть в хорошей игре и уже были.
Если вы хотите игру-квест, где герой превратился в жука и попадает в интересные ситуации - попробуйте Bad Mojo. Если вы хотите симулятор хотьбы, который слишком перенасыщен концептуальными моментами, но при этом в нём минимум интересных моментов с использованием своих фишек (зато есть коллектблы) - может вам и зайдет.

Dumblemort
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
7.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 7 septembre 2020
Produit reçu gratuitement

Si quieres leer más reviews así, visita el mentor haciendo click aquí

Basado en la metamorfosis de Kafka, encontraremos en Metamorphosis un juego a medio camino entre el walking simulator y unas plataformas sencillas pero entretenidas.
Jugablemente nos dedicaremos a movernos de un lado a otro sin mucha más interacción que ir hablando ♥♥♥ los personajes o resolviendo pequeños puzzles, pero aunque simple, las mecánicas de movimiento estan muy bien hechas, para representar el movimiento de un insecto, y se sienten especialmente ágiles y cómodas.

Lo que de verdad merece la pena es la ambientacion de este titulo, que aunque corto, nos permitira visitar varias localizaciones cada una de ellas ♥♥♥ una grandisima cantidad de detalle y muy bien representadas.
El doblaje (en inglés) y la musica estan especialmente bien elegidos, y en conjunto, a nivel visual y sonoro es una propuesta muy solida.

La única pega podría ser su duración, que es de unas 3-4 horas y lo lento de su ritmo, que hace mucho énfasis en las conversaciones. No es un juego para todo el mundo, pero para los amantes de la obra literaria, de los walking simulator o cualquiera que quiera experimentar un juego diferente, es una opcion bastante recomendada, aunque recomiendo tal vez esperar una rebaja.

Nota: 7.25/10
 
Nyper

deniscasian69
1,138 produits enregistrés
0
13 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
5.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 12 aout 2020
变身吧！甲虫兽

受卡夫卡《变形记》启发而制作的具有超现实主义色彩的冒险游戏

主角叫格里高尔，某天早上，他从床上醒了过来，不知道自己身处何处，在花了大概几秒钟的时间后，才终于回忆起来，原来因为朋友的生日，昨晚他们喝多了，现在正在好朋友约瑟夫家寄宿呢。感觉自己足够清新，确认已可以正常行走，他决定在上班前，先去看一看约瑟夫的状况。当他拿起钥匙打开门的时候，奇怪的事情发生了，走廊似乎变化了，明明自己经常来约瑟夫家，却对此场景毫无印象，当他推开下一道门的时候，更奇怪的事情发生了-自己突然变成了又矮又小的甲虫，周围的场景在他面前显得是那么的巨大，仿佛要将自己吞噬一样。还没等搞懂自己身上到底发生了情况的时候，他又意外发现自己的好朋友约瑟夫又因某事被警察逮捕了。为了想办法拯救朋友，为了找寻让自己恢复人类身型的办法，他便以甲虫视角开始了这段充满神奇的冒险之旅。

可玩性
1：包含序章在内，总共8个关卡，玩家将以甲虫的第一人称视角，探索7个具有不同特色的场景。通过这些关卡，没有固定的路线（自由探索），玩家可按照任意方式到达目的地（只要此办法行得通）
2：除了完成区域内的主要任务/解谜来推动剧情外，玩家还可以帮助那些需要帮助的NPC，完成次要解谜/任务，既能解锁成就，又能通过与之对话的方式，了解到更多关于这个世界的信息
3：各场景内都包含一个秘密，相当于收集部分，不过获取后没有任何显示或者记录

游玩感受
本人最讨厌的是虫子，尤其是像蜈蚣，蜘蛛一样的多足类昆虫，恰恰本作是以虫子为主题的游戏，而且还是第一人称视角的近距离观察。虽然知道虫子是不可能会从电脑里面蹦出或者飞出屏幕来，但想一想还是有点小紧张。好在本作的画风偏卡通，除了第一次看到甲虫的两细长前腿跟后期在广场上看到台下密密麻麻的虫群外，在实际游玩的过程中并没有出现过多让我感到特别不适的情况，相反，每次听到它们呜哇呜哇呜哇交流的时候还意外地觉得有点小可爱呢？
这是作者受到奥地利作家弗兰兹·卡夫卡创作的中篇小说《变形记》启发后进行创作的一款游戏，延续了原作里格里高尔某天早上醒来后变成了甲虫的故事背景。在游戏里，玩家全程将以甲虫的第一人称视角展开冒险，通过各种独特的互动方式去探索这个庞大而又扭曲的世界，跟各位NPC对话，了解到更多关于这个世界背后的一些信息，整个体验有种甲虫模拟器+巨人国历险记的味道。
关于剧情，因为内容本就不多，就不剧透了，只说明一点， 最后会有反转。本作为线行流程，玩家只需要跟随着高塔标志符号一路前进即可，不用担心迷路或者找不到方向，游戏内自带提示，地图上的眼睛符号即为目标地。除了主线外，也有部分支线，不过严格来讲，它们算不上支线，首先没有任何奖励，其次对剧情也没有任何影响，顶多会奖励玩家成就，对于成就党来说，或许很具有吸引力。至于解谜跟收集部分，先说解谜，游戏内的解谜量有点少，有点可惜了这么大，又这么美的场景了。比起解谜，跑酷的玩法似乎要更为突出，玩家甚至可以全程开启逮虾户模式速通挑战。然后是收集，游戏内的收集为发着光，像篝火一样搭建起来的小装饰物，玩家将其撞到后，它会显示一个符号，有点让人不明所以，玩家找到后并不知道有什么作用，或许全找到后会解锁什么秘密也说不定。不过它那没有任何提示的收集设定，难以激起玩家前去找寻的动力，到头来有点可有可无的存在感了。
本作一开始就带给我新颖的体验，期间像关闭电风扇，转动阀门跟盖章签字等操作过程也很有代入感，在游玩的过程中，也不容易感觉到枯燥，像音乐盒俱乐部等设施的精妙内部构造，更是让人叹为观止。总的来说推荐尝试，但考虑到流程不长的关系，建议理性入手。
加入爱の榨汁屋&关注爱の鉴赏家，用爱品鉴世间作品，用心流淌真情实感。
强烈推荐
+精致的手绘画风，美妙的古典音乐，独特的互动机制以及有趣的对白
+低FOV营造出了更棒的代入感，不过也可能造成不适感（因人而异）
+镜头的转动跟操控的手感都如丝滑般流畅，加载响应速度也很快
+地图上自带提示，游玩时基本上不会卡关

-谜题设计差点意思，大部分时候都以简单的跑酷为主，可惜了场景建模
-流程较短，即使是一周目慢慢地探索，也最多花费2小时左右
 
𝓜𝓸𝓾𝓹𝓕𝓛𝓸𝔀𝓮𝓻𝓼
0
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
4 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0

1,784 produits enregistrés

1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Recommandé
3.0 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 27 septembre 2020
Miałem dylemat czy dać tej grze minusa za to ,że trąci od niej szkopami na kilometr czy jednak dać plusa za ciekawą historię. Chyba jednak tym razem nie będę bił Niemca.

Gra starcza na jakieś 2-3 godziny w zależności jak szybko ją przechodzisz i nie licząc wszystkich osiągnięć. Jest połączeniem jakichś magicznych zwierząt z harrym potterem i mocnego ćpania przez kilka nocy żeby wymyślić tą grę. Prosta ale jednak ciekawa. Jeśli ktoś jest urzędnikiem to odradzam grania w ten tytuł, inaczej się fobii człowieku nabawisz.

VahidSlayerOfAll
3,953 produits enregistrés
0
5 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
1
Recommandé
3.6 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 24 aout 2020
卡夫卡的奇妙世界
受卡夫卡小说启发而制作的第一人称奇幻冒险解谜游戏，流程约3h，双结局，剧情根据玩家是否选择拯救挚友而迎来不同的落幕。游戏场景从人类房间过渡到光怪陆离的虫之世界，玩家以甲虫的视角在房间各处爬行，在离奇的虫之审判时破坏高塔拯救挚友。场景谜题设计巧妙，游戏画面精致，故事内涵与原著契合，巧舌如簧的主角和不幸挚友的荒诞遭遇流露出对社会现实的批判。一起见证《变形记》的格里高尔和《审判》的约瑟夫将面对的一切吧！
（不要忘记打开字幕！最好把自动奔跑也勾上）
莫须有之罪有了转机（剧透）
本作在剧情和虫设上多有对弗兰兹•卡夫卡的致敬，加载界面似乎也是卡夫卡的名言警句（怕不是《卡夫卡谈话录》摘录的，不过可能是翻译的缘故并未找到出处）。游戏将《变形记》和《审判》的要素提取出来，创作了全新的超现实主义故事：游戏主人公的姓名、遭遇致敬《变形记》，挚友的姓名、遭遇则与《审判》的主人公约瑟夫•K一致。化作bug的主角，为了拯救被莫名其妙判死刑的好朋友，与高塔（象征《审判》中的统治阶层？）治下的形形色色虫子们打交道，和掌控高塔与人类法庭的bugs虚与委蛇，最终将摧毁高塔。

主角格里高尔•萨姆沙参加挚友30岁生日派对，醉酒醒来后却变成了一只爬行的bug。幕后黑手则是掌控人类法庭的虫市长古斯塔夫（致敬卡夫卡的忘年交古斯塔夫•雅诺施），因为维持秩序的法庭在向想要审判的人类下达判决时，出于“人情味”需要亲近的人签署判决书。而这些被变成bug诱骗到高塔签署判决书的知情人类，自然是不能放回去了……虫世界的bugs，都是人类变的，玩家在高塔接待处还会遇到格里高尔的父亲。

约瑟夫在自己的生日派对后睡着，被闹钟惊醒（玩家操作bug启动的），发现一名长相猥琐的警官闯入了自己的房间。被告知自己犯罪，而又不肯透露究竟犯下了什么罪，约瑟夫十分懵逼，期待自己最好的朋友格里高尔来救他。然而格里高尔又失踪了……

在人类世界与虫世界间踏上前往高塔的冒险之旅，格里高尔一路上见到许多bugs，有神神秘秘提供帮助的火辣虫娘莱妮（致敬《审判》的护士），有放映电影的干啥啥不会大师蒂托雷利（致敬《审判》的画家），有……玩家还可以见识到有着各种怪异的人类规矩的虫社会现状。

经过重重考验见虫说虫话的主角，终于来到了签署判决书的大厅中。完成签署仪式的格里高尔，面对法庭的文件存放处和焚化炉，毅然将判决书焚毁。愤怒的古斯塔夫将他投入监狱，然而监狱中有工程师设置的高塔自毁保险，主角摧毁了高塔，拯救了挚友，以虫子的身份与莱妮幸终（虫爱？）。

玩家在高塔中的选择，将决定主角能否变回人类，挚友能否逃脱死刑。即使卖队友变回人类，也会与挚友一样面对审判，而这样一来，就没有第二个格里高尔能救他自己了。

魔幻蒸汽朋克
游戏画面比较精细，玩家作为一只虫子能够在各种神奇的场景冒险。人类世界中主要是在约瑟夫和律师的桌上爬来爬去，沾沾黄油沾沾蓝墨水；虫世界则是幽暗而充满生机；而在人类和虫世界间，在法庭和高塔治下的地方，则宏伟而神奇：仿佛魔法图书馆一样的场景有着自动飞行的文件；俱乐部和酒馆建在留声机中，文件打印机也是虫子们在操作维护，法庭办事处的窗口后也都是虫子在办公，各式机械齿轮、蒸汽装置和黄铜色的管道布满整个房间，还有种种便于虫子操作的设备。

虫子们的配音都是十分古怪含混的，只有人类采用正常的英语配音。游戏音乐搭配也挺好。解谜的引导比较明确，玩家要想方设法抵达目的地并推进剧情，而黏糊糊的墨水与黄油让bug有了抄捷径的方法。谜题的场景和形式都不断变化，使这场冒险毫无枯燥无聊之感。

在跳跃方面，主角是爬行bug不是人立行走bug，镜头在整个匍匐身体的水平线上而不是直立身体最高处，自以为跳不到的高度其实虫子能够到。

结语
本作是一款优秀的冒险解谜游戏，流程不长，操作舒适，美术精致，还能体验爬爬爬的感觉，顺便领略卡夫卡小说中荒诞的现实，推荐入手！
（就是第一次打开游戏居然有报错，能正常进入，可玩的部分没给我算成就，虽然第二次打开能正常解锁后续成就，但想全成就还得全部重打，裂 开）

欢迎参观我的： 双鱼星✪ω✪皇家飛机场 如果你喜欢这篇评论，也麻烦点个赞，让更多人能够看到。
 
Un développeur ou une développeuse a répondu à cette évaluation
月骨戀垶
3,825 produits enregistrés

6 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile

Recommandé
0.6 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 28 octobre 2020
及时获得评测，联系甄游组。(Connoisseur）
记录真实体验，发掘冷门精品。(Video）[space.bilibili.com]
Q群124925250 u_uju@163.com

奇妙的微观跑酷体验。
中文名《变形记》，官方汉化很不错。
一觉醒来，看着自己的修长美腿，咿？我怎么变成了虫子？
在微观环境下观察所有寻常物品都变得巨大而奇妙，利用粘液可以垂直爬墙。
按TAB有很好的路径引导，谜题不难，通关流程顺畅。
鲜丽的卡通风格，尘土和孢子，一切都不恐怖，令人充满好奇。
是一部可以在奇妙体验的过程中思考人生哲学的奇特游戏。

游戏体积9G

PS：晕3D的朋友稍微注意，可能会有一点点眩晕。

试玩演示https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1Bz4y1o7CJ/

甲虫视角很难受，地图和引导做得不好，可惜操作的容错率也不高，起码三分之一的游戏时间实在找路和摔死中度过的。剧情的话非常遗憾，刚刚被里面的荒诞讽刺，虫虫世界和人类世界的关系所吸引，结果啪地一下就结束了，并没有一个满意的结尾。结局其实只有一个，就是虫虫市女智者告诉你的你和母蜘蛛的命运，救朋友那里的操作都尝试过了，不影响结局，好好的故事与隐喻的底子全浪费掉了，真的可惜。
 
astrovoid
525 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
3.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 23 décembre 2023
I give this game a rank C- (55-60%)
Average game - only if you have nothing else to do.
See my profile for more details about my reviews.

Additional notes: I am very disappointed, in a sad way, not an angry way, which means it still gets a recommendation from me, but a small one. I understand better the Metacritic rating of this game. It had SO MUCH potential! One of the best games of all time for me is Bad Mojo, so I REALLY wanted to love this game... so many similarities! Inspired by Kafka, some personal hero story and saving someone, using pipes to explore a world (although this one is much more magic based than Bad Mojo), and reading papers scattered here and there... but aside from that? The gameplay is pure 3D platform via First Person view, dialoguing with NPCs for fetching missions (to unlock A go talk to B, but B tells you to unlock C, to unlock C you need to talk to D, etc... bad mission design), and the overall content is very short. Sadly I don't like the surrealistic/magical/philosophical aspect they took for this game, even if I understand why and the Kafka thing... but in the end it feels more like a student big project. In Bad Mojo, the realism and thriller aspect of it was the spice. Here? I could not really care about the story, the dialogues were really weird (translation problem maybe?), and the level design did not feel smart or fascinating. The music is a bit too eccentric (very arty/universitary kind of), but the voices and sound effects are good. I am so disappointed because I always wanted a modern heir for Bad Mojo... but this is not the one. It tried, though, and it could have been AWESOME, with its potential... But I will forget this game in a couple of days for sure. It is cheap though!

A unique game based on the book by Franz Kafka. I wouldn't say "Wow!" More like "Interesting experience". If it was a long game, it would wear out it's welcome, but it was a fun ride for a few hours. Greygoth
614 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
4.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 28 février 2023
A short but delightfully surreal game loosely based on Franz Kafka's eponymous novel, The Metamorphosis.

A platformer/puzzle hybrid, you wake up one morning to find yourself transforming into a bug, and set out to turn yourself back into a human. You do this by platforming around real locations, such as a bedroom or lawyer's office, and fantastical locations, such as a bug speakeasy located inside a gramophone, or a village of bugs preparing to watch a movie.

Being able to speak to the bugs is very charming, and there are a variety of little sidequests that give you more opportunities to do so, which is welcome. As you go through the real-world levels you'll observe your friend going through increasingly troublesome Kafkaesque bureaucracy, and listening to these conversations is quite entertaining. The puzzle elements are very light and consist of platforming, going up certain walls, and operating switches, so don't expect to be stuck for very long if at all.

The game is very short as evidenced by my 100% completion time, so it may be a tad expensive for you at full price, but if you see this on sale or in a bundle I can highly recommend this surreal gem.
 
heidi
322 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
3.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 27 février 2023
Got me to buy the complete works of Kafka. This game is a wonderful dream trip, blending the surreal experience of what it's like to look through the eyes of a bug with the existential nightmare of being a tiny, insignificant cog in a convoluted, impractical machine meant to exploit and inevitably throw you away all while making life unnecessarily hard and distracting to keep you running that proverbial hamster wheel.

Also appreciate this game for having the best possible movement for a walking sim of this nature. Fast, agile, and free, so much so that it's actually fun to just run around as a bug. a far cry better than a lot of walking sims that think slow and limited is the right way to go.

My only criticism is that the game restricts wall walking to requiring you have some limited resource like honey or ink to cling to walls. There's just not enough of a puzzle or challenge element to the levels to demand this restriction. It would have been better if it was just a default ability, allowing for unlimited full freedom. Also, and this really is just for aesthetics, but it would have been niffy to be able to walk upright. A bunch of other bugs do it, so why can't we, just for the sake of it?
 
Zxyaelll

Metamorphosis is a game inspired by Kafkas 'Verwandlung'. The background music is relly well fitting and enhances the atmosphere created by the nice and detailed scene design. It's a quite short game if you don't go for 100% but it's nevertheless entertaining, especially if you are searing a game less ordinary.
But I 'd advise making backup saves, after you reach the ship since my saves where wiped a while after that and that ship was where I had to start all over again. But overall I still would recommend playing it!

albae
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
4.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 1 mars 2022
Fellow uncultured swine who has never read Kafka, you might be wondering "Am I going to enjoy this game?".
The answer is: meh, sure. It's a very, VERY basic platformer that finds its strength in a couple of well designed levels and fun side characters.
When I say "Well designed levels" I mean it almost exclusively from a visual point of view, since the gameplay itself is always pretty dull. You justs scuttle around on your little bug-legs, occasionally climbing on surfaces and hitting buttons.
The theme of the plot is still enjoyable even if you have no clue about the literary background, as it revolves around maddeningly inefficient bureaucracy.
The insect you will interact with along the way are all cool, and I particularly enjoyed the way they (and you ) talk.

TL;DR: an honest 6/10 short game.
 
Fuzz
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Non recommandé
3.3 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 21 février 2022
It would be really difficult to recommend this even disregarding the price tag. While it is overall well done and does capture hints of Kafka's absurdism, I doubt someone who isn't acquainted with the subtleties of his writing will find much unique about the superficial social critique on offer and whoever has read either of the two stories this game is mostly based on will find the despondent and vaguely dystopian atmosphere largely missing.
The level design was nice enough, if not amazing by any means, but I did find the often poor quality of the textures fairly disappointing, especially since you spend all of your time so close to the ground that it really would have warranted more attention to detail, even with the stylized art style. Finally, the performance of Unreal Engine games seems to be hit or miss from player to player, but for me it was so utterly atrocious as to be nearly unplayable no matter the settings, which unfortunately detracted a good amount of enjoyment as well. Overall it's not bad, but there wasn't enough there for me to be worthwhile.
 
ashes.ney

I bought this because the bug movement and level design looked really satisfying, and it was.

One thing I would say is the voice acting is bad and repetitive and overall cringy, but it doesn't make you sit and watch anything, you just overhear conversations as you work through the level. I recommend this purely on the basis that it doesn't force you to sit through long dialogue.

Don't think too hard about it, just go be a bug.

Recommandé
3.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 13 février 2022
短小精悍，一周目3小时可通关。
取材于卡夫卡的小说《变形记》，微观世界下精致的昆虫小镇令人记忆犹新。
视觉效果方面，无论是化身爬虫还是还原人形的那刻视觉切换，还包括后期由电影荧幕进入高塔的转场，都有一些《超阈限空间》；变小后以往平平无奇的物件顿时奇异非凡，用想象力对抽屉里、打印机下的昆虫世界进行扩充，又像是《双人成行》。剧情表达方面颇为隐晦，另外任务指引有所欠缺。
全成就很容易，不过应该不会再刷了。
 
Parker Pyne
617 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Non recommandé
7.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 13 février 2022
It really is fun. I enjoyed being a bug for a long time, exploring the wonderfully handcrafted environment, talking to other bug, smiling about the subtle humor. Up to the point where, like in so many of these games, someone decided to place a stupidly simple yet so hard to do jump puzzle, that for no reason stalls the progress of the player so unnecessarily, turning the game experience into a mere battle against the controls.
Why are game designers doing this? Do they all run out of ideas at some point? Do they want to try and see how much their players are willing to punish themselves? Or is it in this case just to extend the game time artificially?
A thing like that, that does not match the whole concept, pace and fun up to this point in a game can completely turn fun into frustration. It is that kind of design error that needs to be punished by the players so that designers learn how to do things right.
This is not a competitive game. The focus is narrative, art, and fun. Why someone would suddenly confront the player with an obstacle that simply isn't fun, but just key mashing is a mystery to me.

And of course then this happens: For no apparent reason you are being beamed back two or three chapters in the story and you have to do it all over again.

As beautiful the game looks and as unique the experience may be, so sloppy and unimaginative is the actual game play.
 
Victor van Void

355 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
6.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 1 novembre 2021
It´s... a weird bug game.
The story takes a strange turn where you get turned into a bug by the Tower.

An unexplained game, but a fun game nonetheless. The small puzzles and the fact that you play an insect were the selling points for me.
Music didn't stand out to me, but the environment did. Especially when you were not in a drawer.

Through your journey to the tower to turn yourself back human and save your friend Josef you get to meet other bugs. Unfortunately you don't get the oppurtunity to get to known them (more than just name bacis and occupation), which makes the game kind of... flat.
Not a lot is explained and the ending is not necessarily satisfactory.
What is the tower? You don't know. How did you got turned into a bug? You don't know. What is your friend Josef exactly accused of? You don't know. And who is Leni exactly? You don't know. So there are a lot of things you won't learn in the game. Or I missed those for some reason.

Depending on the ending you choose it's kind of abrupt. I choose to save Josef I meet Leni and the credits roll.

Even though the game is missing quite a few elements (in my opinion) it's a fun short game to play.
 
Ammie

Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
26.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 9 octobre 2021
This is a really good looking game, and I like the artwork and music throughout. It is a fun and light take on Kafka. There were a couple of places in the game I wished there had been more of a prompt of what to do, but for the most part it was pretty good at giving you all the info you need. It is a fun puzzle game. There were a couple of parts that stressed me out a little - one where you have to jump around on pipes up high, and at the end when you have to run while jumping up high - because I am freaked out by heights, even in video games, lol. It was a bit short, I would recommend getting it on sale.
 
strangerXdesign
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
2.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 5 septembre 2021
Quelle surprise que de trouver un jeu basé sur La Métamorphose de Kafka ! Un jeu d'aventure / plateforme qui fonctionne parfaitement, vous plongeant dans le corps d'un homme transformé à son réveil en insecte. Et c'est là que la magie opère. Vos déplacements sont maintenant ceux de cet insecte et offrent un sentiment de liberté très agréable. Une grande fluidité de déplacement, la possibilité de sauter, grimper des surfaces verticales et interagir avec votre environnement à la taille démesurée par rapport à votre nouvelle peau.

Côté scénario, le jeu nous invite à comprendre la raison de notre transformation, mais également à voler au secours d'un ami, en proie aux griffes de la justice. On découvre alors tout un univers, dissimulé derrière les murs de notre chambre ou d'un bureau, partant à la rencontre d'une faune d'insectes vivants et agissants de manière organisée et hiérarchisée, dans un but bien précis, nous amenant à comprendre la raison de notre présence en ces lieux et de notre transformation.

Le concept lui même offre à découvrir une ambiance originale, poussée par la rencontre d'insectes variés aux attitudes tout aussi diverses mais aussi par un décor démesuré.

On pourra cependant regretter la faible durée de vie du titre, entre deux et trois heures pour arriver au bout de l'histoire.
 
HexaSky

kripoekla
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
2.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 29 aout 2021
Неоднозначный проект... С чего начать? Пожалуй с того что к произведению Франца Кафки "Превращение" игра не имеет фактически ни какого отношения. В игре есть пара высказываний Кафки , ну и сама идея внезапного превращения из человека в насекомое так же заимствована у писателя. В остальном игра отношения к повести не имеет. Как я понимаю для большинства игроков это вообще не имеет значения. Идея игры интересная. Дизайн уровней занятный. Музыкальное сопровождение подобрано очень хорошо... Но играть не очень интересно. Очень трудно дать финальную оценку. Как игра проект не очень интересен. Это тот случай когда "картинка" интереснее игрового процесса. Когда то в одном из обзоров к другому проекту прочёл высказывание которое идеально подойдёт и для этого проекта: "Очередная работа художников, выпущенная в Steam вод видом игры." Проекту как игре мне сложно поставить положительную оценку, но с другой стороны как художественный проект игра замечательна и даёт необычный опыт. Лично мне трудно советовать кому бы то ни было эту игру, но сам я не жалею о её приобретении и в целом получил от игры удовольствие.

tonton_br
228 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
2.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 23 juillet 2021
Consiglieresti questo gioco? Certo, ma non a 20€!
Questo titolo è veramente unico. Platform ed enigmi che dovrai risolvere nelle sembianze di un insetto che può arrampicarsi ed andare ovunque! Le strade per raggiungere un obbiettivo sono molteplici, e questo da la libertà al giocatore di esplorare e scegliere il tragitto che gli sembra più corretto. Fortunatamente c'è questa possibilità che spezza la monotonia di alcuni momenti, in qui lo stesso Gregor penserà al perché sta facendo tutto questo, quando basterebbero poche e semplici azioni!
Tuttavia i modelli degli npg e l'ambiente sono veramente spettacolari!
La durata è veramente striminzita. In nemmeno 3 ore si finisce il gioco e la parte finale è veramente banalotta.
Un consiglio, merita il prezzo ma quello dei saldi!

+ Visuals and environments.
+ Music and voice acting.
+ Atmosphere.
+ Platforming mechanics.

Évaluation publiée le 5 mai 2021
I enjoyed the first half of the game but the second half got a bit boring. Basically the first half is more of a platformer, where you have to figure out how to navigate a world of everyday objects when you've become very tiny. The second half however turns into more of an adventure game of sorts where a lot of the gameplay is just walking back and forth talking to different characters etc, which isn't necessarily a bad thing, but the gameplay nor the characters failed to captivate me much.

Évaluation publiée le 3 mai 2021
This game really feels like one, inspired by Kafka's works. It's not only Metamorphosis, rather a mix of several novels, that help build up a story, create atmosphere.

One complaint is about buggy keyboard controls. Somewhere in the middle of the game, I had to perform a long jump, and no matter how I tried, it seemed impossible. Finally, I connected Xbox controller. And made it from a first attempt.

However, I really enjoyed these 5-6 hours inside Kafka's world.
10 out of 10.

Magister Ludi
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
25.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 25 avril 2021
While this isn't the style of game that I really enjoy, I do recommend it as a good addition to anyone's library, especially at the current sale price. It is very well made, a good length, and creates a very complete world. Beautiful designs and graphics, but I consider it to be far more "parkour lite" than "puzzle." For the most part the "puzzle" aspect is figuring out what path to take from one place to the next. As someone who prefers slow paced, complex puzzle, impossible to die games, this wasn't ideal, but it wasn't bad in any way either. You can die in this game but it really isn't a problem if you do. You just get sent back to a very recent point where you try again, and the controls are not so difficult to use for someone who plays slow puzzle games only (unless some disability prevents you from playing other games of course). You'll get it after a couple of tries. The story-line, while not very appealing to me, is well thought through, well written, and well executed. I do not regret time spent playing this game even though it is not the style of game that I prefer. If you play games in slow explorer style you will find some gems in this game. Talk to the other bugs, listen to their conversations, etc. There are bug cults, bug military, bug politics, bug religion, bug dance clubs, really bug versions of many things you would find in the human world and they are entertainingly well written. The length of the game is satisfying. It will likely take you quite a few sessions to complete unless you are super hardcore. I bought it at $7 and would estimate that it is worth about $25-30 based on the quality of the game. I'm not sure that I would call it story-rich, but I'm not even sure that I understand what that means. There is a well written story plot that you will clearly be following throughout the whole game. There is nothing confusing or unclear about the plot as far as I can tell (although I think that with most games that people think are confusing so I could be wrong in this regard). Despite the game not being my preferred style, I would still highly recommend it as an addition to anyone's library. (I do have a new laptop so I'm not sure if gameplay would have been difficult on my old one. You may need to check other reviews for information about gameplay on older devices.)

Scratch all of this the ending is stupid.
There are two possible endings and they are both stupid.
Nevermind. Do not recommend.
 
fog_aether
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
4.3 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 19 avril 2021
Fun experience for about 4 hrs. I guess it would make more sense if one is familiar with Franz Kafka and his stories Metamorphosis and The Trial as they feature prominently in the story. Sound effects and music was good. The controls on M&K were great and not frustrating. Story got a little bogged down in errands the character had to do in the second half but maybe that was the point and learning more about Kafka. The world/environment reminded me of Alice in Wonderland, The Littles, Brazil movie, and Micro Machines. Would recommend for someone who is looking for something a little off the beaten path but not too off-road.
 
Carolus Magnus
528 produits enregistrés

1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile

Recommandé
3.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 16 avril 2021
Großartiges Spiel für einen schönen Abend (3-4 Std.) der einen bleibenden Eindrücken zurücklässt.
Für Leute mit Bezug zu Kafka eine 100 % Empfehlung, Charmante Mischung aus Kafka und der klassischen Heldenreise.
Auch Kafka Neulinge sollten sich vom vergebendem Platformer nicht abschrecken lassen, der unterhält aber nicht Fordert. Braucht er auch nicht, das Spiel lebt von seinem herausragendem Narrativ sowie der einladenden Atmosphäre, beides wird von überrauschenden Details, Figuren und der innovativen Erzählkunst getragen.

Кувыркается жучок на горошке козьем
Хоп! И стал он светлячок, только в новой позе
Он не крутится уже, а жужжит сияя
Хоп! И перестал сиять, стал пушистый зая
Он за ушком почесал, ушки отвалились
И в мохнатых червячков тут же превратились
Хоп! И зая уж енот, мордочку полощет
В воду поглядел и вот, не енот, а лошадь
Поглядела лошадь вниз, чудесам не веря
Между ног писюн повис. Хоп! Да это мерин!
Конь заржал, пустился вскачь, прыгает, резвится
Хоп! И уж не конь, а грач над землёй кружится
Хоп! И он бурундучок! Хоп! И вот он кошка!
Хоп! Проснулся наш жучок, лежа на горошке.

Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
2.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 2 mars 2021
路途很奇妙，有种在看童话故事的感觉
这款游戏对于昆虫世界的打造是丰富的，虽然画面表现一般，但从场景元素来看是充满童趣的
然而最可惜的是并没有给出更多的背景信息来告诉我这个世界是怎样运转的，而我的朋友又做了什么要被判决
（也可能是我真的没有耐心听完他们那么慢条斯理的说话）
结局也不尽如人意，给人一种怪异的感觉，感觉开发人员只做了一个浅尝辄止的昆虫魔法世界
如果喜欢这样的世界观和变小以后的冒险，可以尝试一下
全中文很友好的游戏，就是建议打折的时候再买。
 
南山敬老刘华强♂
150 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
3.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 28 février 2021
A nice adventure game inspired by Kafka's Metamorphosis. Simple but fun gameplay, supported by an amazing artwork. Story is a bit obscure but intriguing and the feeling of being a bug is well conveyed.
The only thing I didn't like is that sometimes I felt like playing two different games: I liked the realistic areas like Josef's room or the lawyer's desk (I always loved the idea of seeing our houses become huge worlds for tiny players!) and I liked the more surreal chapters, like the bug town or the Tower, but I didn't like when they mixed (like, finding a whole wolrd behind a drawer). I would have preferred sticking to one of the two versions (but it's a very personal consideration and, in the end, the mix works enough to make a good game)
 
Rava
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
3.3 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 26 février 2021
Metamorphosis is a different puzzle-adventure in which the protagonist starts as a human but in a few seconds transforms into a an ant. Small game, it took me around 3-3,5 hours to beat. The story wasnt anything special, but it was ok. The graphics are decent. In general i can say, that i had fun with this game. I reccomend it if you want something relaxing and a different walking simulator with a dose of puzzles.

Το Metamorphosis είναι ένα διαφορετικό puzzle-adventure στο οποίο ο χαρακτήρας σου ενώ ξεκινάς ως άνθρωπος μετά από λίγα δευτερόλεπτα μεταμορφώνεσαι σε μυρμήγκι. Σχετικά μικρό σε μέγεθος, μου πήρε 3-3,5 ώρες για τερματισμό. Η ιστορία δεν είναι τίποτα ιδιαίτερο αλλά οκ κάτι υπάρχει. Τα γραφικά είναι συμπαθητικά. Γενικά μπορώ να πω ότι πέρασε ευχάριστα η ώρα. Το προτείνω αν θες κάτι χαλαρό και ένα διαφορετικό walking simulator με μια δόση γρίφων.

Évaluation publiée le 19 février 2021
Sim e Nào, a história é interessante (mas nada a ver com o livro) trilha sonora maneira demais, gráficos bonitos, cenário e ambiência bacana e tudo isso contribui pra imersão na história, maaaaaass....
O jogo é MUITO curto, mas muito curto mesmo, terminei em 8 horas de jogo e isso pq tive problema com um save e tive q refazer boa parte da história. Paguei 18 laranjais no jogo e, apesar da qualidade, acho q não vale a pena o preço por tão poucas horas de jogo, mas se está sobrando no seu bolso e não vai fazer falta manda bala e aproveita
 
Macaco_Atomico
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
3.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 17 février 2021
Я читал все основные произведения Франца Кафки, поэтому игрой остался доволен. Чего-то большего от игрульки на один вечер по мотивам сразу двух произведений Кафки я и не ждал. Я пишу про два произведения, так как от "Превращения" осталась лишь сама концепция превращения в жука, а вот центральный сюжет, происходящий параллельно со злоключениями Грегора Замзы, - это сюжет "Процесса", моего любимого романа Кафки. По сути, весь геймплей прекрасно иллюстрирует данный роман: игроку в образе жука придется пройти самый настоящий бюрократический ад, выполняя поручения одно за другим... и все лишь для того, чтобы проснуться от этого кошмара. Благо, игра вышла очень уж недолгой - ее можно в прямом смысле пробежать за 3,5 часа, а то и быстрее. Грегор-жук гоняет по колоритным локациям как бешеный, будто ему вот-вот откусят лапки. Классная музыка, интересные локации, сюрреализм во всей красе. Но удовольствия мало: геймплей, кроме спринта по пыльным полкам и лазания по вертикальным поверхностям после того, как измазался в клею, никаких сюрпризов не преподносит. Больше 180 рублей на этот продукт тратить не советую.
 
Vitelly10kin
330 produits enregistrés
0

7.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 13 février 2021
Immersive platformer from a bug's perspective. Nothing groundbreaking about the story but a decent mesh of Kafka's work. Atmosphere was very neat. Wish there had been a bit more story but overall I'd recommend. I'd say it's a good value if you wait for a sale. The soundtrack & voice acting were great too.
 
FurianAvenger69
1,923 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
10.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 24 janvier 2021
Superb game!

Visually stunning, with great sound design and music to par.
Fresh and fun gameplay (platforming with some puzzle elements), and a intriguing world for you to explore on six legs.

Not too short, nor too long.

Kafkaesque? Well, a bit more playful than the source material, but faithful nonetheless. Obviously done with a lot of love. All in all a good adaption. The ending(s) left a bit to be desired for me, but in this case it was truly a case of "the journey being what mattered."

Verdikt: Heartily recommended!

3.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 2 janvier 2021
This is a three hour game with quite beautiful environments. The sound design is quite good as well. I found myself laughing at much of the writing.

The ending is abrupt and does not tie up the loose ends. At times, the game lets you progress through the story out of order, which can cause great confusion when my character suddenly knows something that I don't.

Get this game only on sale.

9.6 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 30 décembre 2020
Metamorphosis is a fun adventure style game with a surreal twist and parkour movement mechanics. Very enjoyable and relaxing. First run taking your time will likely take around 5 hours, though you can bust through it by skipping dialog and not exploring easily in 2 hours. The Achievements were great to figure out and being able to revisit chapters to pick up ones I missed the first time though was great.

I finished it in under 2 hours. This is far more a first person platformer than a puzzle platformer. Yes, there are puzzles. But they are rather easy to figure out, and quickly so. The world itself is interesting and well designed, but story wise there simply isn't much here. It's really a shame because the game could have been so much more interesting if they'd of put more into detailing the world and exactly why you became a bug.

Although the replay ability factor of Metamorphosis is non-existent, as it is just a one-time experience that although feels novel at first, but can easily get boring and repetitive if done for long enough.

And although it does not meet Kafka’s world head-on with its new story, the game still holds itself proud because of its breathtaking graphics and gameplay like non-other.

Website Review: https://www.studio35online.com/metamorphosis-review-a-scenic-bizarre-indie-with-a-complex-story/

SanyaNeNado
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
7.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 6 décembre 2020
I've read the book so I was very curious, don't expect the same like the book but a separate story in the same 'universe'.
Just like the book it is a short-story, but very much enjoyable with a touch of fun game mechanics. I wouldn't recommend it when it is at €21, but on sale (like I did) for around €10, which is a good price.

I've replayed some parts for the achievements(100%) and got me around 8 hours of gameplay. The time to complete the story is around 3-5 hours, depending on your game-style (quick or soak everything in).

A tip:
You can disable the 'mouse smoothing' in the game settings, makes the game more enjoyable.
 
Dutchvirus
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
4.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 2 décembre 2020
Interesting game, weird ending. This game could have been great on VR. Unfortunately no VR. Still, if you're a Franz Kafka fan, this must be an awesome game. Since i'm not really a Franz Kafka fan, you'll understand why I have mixed feelings about this game. As much as I love the unique perspective, the game itself feels hard to understand. You somehow changed into a bug, feeling something like a WW2 period, and then you stay a bug forever making love to another bug? I'm so confused right now. Maybe this is typical Kafka material, but for me, its weird lol. Although i finished the game with 3 hours of gameplay, Again, interesting game, great atmosphere, familiar storyline (ww2 feels) but the ending felt not satisfied. I'm giving this a thumbsup but again, mixed feels about this game lol.
 
Lawie
3,206 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
2.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 27 novembre 2020
Metamorphosis ti porta a guardare la realta' da un punto di vista che per certi versi si potrebbe dire "bassa", in cui si puo capire e comprendere la mentalita' e la visione di una societa' la quale non ti aspetta (almeno secondo il mio parere e punto di vista) e vuole schiacciarti sotto i suoi piedi. Tra percorsi e dialoghi si capisce la amentalita' dei personaggi che ci si pongono davanti a noi e come loro interagiscano e si siano integrati gli uni agli altri, la storia mi ha davvero impressionato, tra le sue meccaniche e ambientazioni ne risaltano molto i colori tetri e non. La storia se seguita ci porta in gameplay di un paio d'ore che sapranno pero' farvi riflettere lungo il tragitto, l'importante e leggere e ascoltare la storia che vi sta parlando e di quello che realmente vuole esprimervi. Lo consiglio calorosamente ^^.

eterniPROJECT
669 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
5.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 11 octobre 2020
Понравилось: Приятное плавное управление, интересные локации и классная задумка, отсылки к литературным произведениям, здоровая сатира над бюрократией. Классная работа со звуком и музыкальной темой.
Не понравилось: полное игнорирование персонажа-насекомого людьми. Элемент стелса с попытками не быть обнаруженным и активное движение по столу, например, на котором часто переставляются предметы очень сильно добавило бы геймплею динамики. Локация "город жуков" (она же "жукбург") какая то нелепая по своей логике, бесконечно бегаешь из одного угла в другой - это раздражает.

В общем и целом - приятное и необычное приключение на один вечер, позволяющее попробовать себя в качестве зрителя-насекомого в мире людей ( и не только). Зайдёт не всем, полагаю, но опыт интересный.
 
EvoNuke
296 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
13.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 11 octobre 2020
Produit reçu gratuitement

Video games allow you to enter a world that you never though possible. You can be a warrior, a ghost, heck even a teacup. Metamorphosis allows you to play as a bug. Complete with creepy crawl form, eerie bug voice and special insect-only powers. It is safe to say that if you are not a fan of bugs, spiders or insects this is probably not a good game for you. For the rest of us, All in! Games brings to life this bug filled masterpiece.

If you love classic adventure games, (myst, quest for glory, maniac mansion) this is sure to be a big win for you. If you’ve never tried that type of game before then this is a good one to start with. You literally turn into a bug and based on amazing graphics, voice acting and story you will be traveling in a brand new bug filled Frank Kafka world. Its a great trip and I fully recommend give Metamorphosis a play.

Full Detailed Review Here - https://www.worldofgeekstuff.com/metamorphosis-indie-video-game-review-a-kafka-adventure/
 
DreamGeekGal

Its a first person puzzel platformer that takes you through some mildly interesting environments and a mildly interesting story. If your into that sorta thing then try this on a heavy sale. If not then you'd best look elsewhere.

Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
4.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 4 septembre 2020
Seeing the trailer and the original demo for metamorphosis, things felt pretty interesting and neat- but I certainly did not get the experience that I thought I would get. This game is VERY different in story than what the trailer presents.

The game is enjoyable, and the story is decent. It's nothing incredible and at some point it feels like its rushing you, but for most of the game you'll probably be chatting to random bugs to see their flavortext, and maybe you'd be wandering around to see how the environment is built. The entire situation is in fact, quite absurd, and the game does not try to make it seem normal either. Everything in the game, the story, the situation, and the things that happen is straight up absurd and it revels in that.
My main gripes with the game are pretty basic, honestly. I went into the game to hear a story about a dude that turned into a bug and i got just that.

Here's most of the ♥♥♥♥, possible SLIGHT spoiler warning?
Note that these ♥♥♥♥ are mostly little nitpicks that bothered me rather than actual issues with the game.

-The game really tries with its german in the OST, due to being based off of kafka's work. The issue is is that if you're streaming this to show the game to your german friends, they will immediately notice that this is someone pretending to be german. Not a huge problem, but can be an annoyance.
-Continuing on the german usage- A lot of texts on papers in the game are fully in german. This is great for flavor, but as someone that was trying to solve a puzzle by READING each readable object, I very much struggled because I couldn't understand anything!
-Audio loops. God. So many of them. The audio loop between Joseph and the Lawyer is infiuriating! There's at most 2-3 minutes of dialogue, that then proceeds to loop over and over again as you're going through the level.... Which lasts at least 20-30 minutes depending on if you know where you're supposed to go.
But that's not all of it! At some point, the NPC bug noises just... are the same set of sounds over and over again. This wouldn't be an issue for bugs there just to fill the space, or unimportant to the plot, but I could not enjoy actual serious scenes with characters that had some sort of importance to the plot because they were all using the same grumble, the same pitches, over and over again. It's incredibly sad, as I LOVE the whole "bug language" thing, especially Gregor's lines! They're all so unique and interesting!
-Jumping is a bit scuffed. If you're not sprinting, and you're trying to jump while moving, it feels like there is not enough lunge to it. This is particularly annoying in platforming areas.
-The end of the story is very sudden and lacklustre. I don't know if this is just normal in the original book this was based on, but I felt like the end of the game was very rushed and straight up like a deus ex machina. (and also unclear on how to get the "good" ending...). I wish that there would have been a bit more to the "good" ending, and not just Leni going "lol tough ♥♥♥♥ ur a bug forever now". It could have been at least a little more extended.
 
Elk
263 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
4.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 31 aout 2020
I recommend this game but only if you know what it has to offer beforehand.
You shouldn't play Metamorphosis if you're looking for:

- A direct adaptation of Kafka's book.
- A deep story filled with memorable characters.
- A challenging and lengthy game with complex gameplay.

You absolutely SHOULD play this game if you want:

- One of the most immersive and unique walking simulators i've ever played.
- A wonderfully bizarre, impressive looking world to explore.

Basically, if you don't mind shallow gameplay and a somewhat short runtime, you'll love Metamorphosis.

游戏由鉴赏家杉果点评小分队提供
给游戏选择困难症的玩家指路 成为我们的一员小组首页 欢迎新朋友加入QQ群：641445229 (｡･∀･)ﾉﾞ
《变形记》。这是一款第一人称冒险解谜游戏，游戏采用了卡通画风，游戏改编自卡夫卡的《变形记》，设定方面较为还原，但在故事上本作和小说是相对独立存在，但风格上与原作比较相似，以及游戏中还有与原作相联系的一些物品，如果你喜欢小说原作，那一定要亲自体验主角奇幻的冒险之旅，路人玩家如果感兴趣，在不反感虫子的情况下，也是非常推荐来游玩的。

Évaluation publiée le 14 aout 2020
Wowsers! I wanted to wait for a few reviews before buying this, I had been watching it for a while and was hoping it would live up to expectations, although painfully short, I can highly recommend it. It is a wonderful experience, a beautiful world to explore and navigate, nothing too taxing just a deeply pleasant journey into bugs and bureaucracy. If you don't know Kafka's amazing works, The Metamorphosis and this incredible adaptation are a bit like "A bugs life" meets "Brazil" (Wow that dates me).
Thank you developers - Wonderful!

Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
6.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 14 aout 2020
This game is like a puzzle platformer but drunk, in a most excellent way. It's a variation on Kafka's metamorphosis, you are Gregor Samsa, and you've turned into a bug, how are you going to your initial human state? The gameplay reminds me a bit of the Alien in AvP but with much better controls. The perspective of the world seen through the eye of an insect is excellent, so far great humour and very eerie atmosphere. The art and graphics are very nice, they remind me of older games (like Dark Corner of the Earth or the more recent A Story About my Uncle, but polished with up to date graphics, its all very pretty!), which intensifies the feeling of strangeness. After 1.3h of game i'm completely into it, i've found the valve behind James Joyce's Ulysses, i've stopped the flooding and I'm wondering where the pipes will lead me... (so far the 20 quid are worth it)

Update: It took me 5 hours to finish the game while taking some time to explore, it seems like a fair amount of time. It is a rather short game but it is very satisfying, it is not a great challenge but it is a fantastic experience and for that I strongly recommend it. I still think the 20 quid are worth it. Congratulations to the team at Ovid works for the pleasant gameplay and the amazing dreamlike art and ambiance throughout this game.
 
Sgt Ironpants
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
4.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 13 aout 2020
Довольный игрой Metamorphosis

В игре очень приятная атмосфера с музыкальным сопровождением. Мне не совсем понравилось то, что мышка двигается чересчур плавно, играя за человека это сильно чувствуется, но в облике жука это вполне приемлемо (или я просто привык к этому). Управление клавишами несложное и интуитивное.

Приемлемое разнообразие головоломок: не слишком сложные, но и не совсем простые. Графика также на неплохом уровне, правда, в некоторых местах текстуры "наезжают" друг на друга и выглядит это немного отталкивающе.

О сюжете скажу лишь, что: он раскрывается не через диалоги, а через мир и окружающие нас предметы. В игре всего 8 глав и на каждую главу уходит примерно 20-40 минут, то есть игра проходится часа за 3-4. Хоть и есть некая иллюзия на варианты прохождения, но на самом же деле итог нашего выбора будет один и ничего не изменится.

Люди ставят минусы в основном из-за короткого времени прохождения и линейности всего происходящего. Однако, за такую цену глупо ждать чего-то большего.
 
Dontaz
897 produits enregistrés

Basically buy it on sale if you're interested, I'm gonna go make lunch.

Un développeur ou une développeuse a répondu à cette évaluation
anatoliy.56rus
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
4.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 13 aout 2020
My old English teacher recommended the short novel to me and I loved it, so naturally I was intrigued by this game.

[UPDATE]
I finished the game. It ended a lot more sudden and surprisingly than I had expected and wanted. Overall though, I still had a good time with it. It was a fun distraction.
What I said below still stands, though I'd like to add a few things.
The story felt a bit rushed, especially towards the end.
Aside from some subtle hints and themes, and the use of names, I also feel like this had almost nothing to do with the novella. (UPDATE: After reading some reviews, it seems that the story pays homage to some of Kafka's other works as well, which went over my head and is very interesting.)
The game definitely needs to be replayed in order to acquire all the achievements, which I like.
I just wish it offered more in almost every aspect, I really want to experience more. The unique characters are really interesting, but there aren't many. The world you've built is incredibly cool and creative, and i want to explore more. I almost feel like there is an opportunity for a single-player/coop RPG with what you've built. I also wish the game offered more of a challenge, as most if not all of the puzzles were only slowed down by me trying to find the way.
Albeit harsh, some negative reviews I feel are definitely warranted, but I can't say I personally wouldn't recommend this to someone who is in need of a quick little distraction. It was fun for what it was, and It didn't put a dent in my wallet.
Thanks for making this game and I hope to see more projects from you in the future!
[/update]

It's really fun, I feel I'm about halfway through, but I can say the movement mechanics are really enjoyable and the environments are beautiful.
Puzzles are a little too easy, yet somewhat unclear at times but it feels like any direction you take will offer up clues.
The bug characters are funny and interesting and have kept my interest up so far.
The story is mysterious and unique but to get some points feels like a little bit of a chore and I wish it was written better or more interestingly.
Can't wait to finish this game, but so far I'd say it has a fair price and is pretty fun.
 
Un développeur ou une développeuse a répondu à cette évaluation
